titleStmt.title: A vindication of His Majesty and the army. As also the grounds and reasons of the armies guarding and preservation of His Majesties person. Authorized by speciall command.
titleStmt.author: Joyce, George, fl. 1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Benson, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery lane neer the Rouls,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Reymes, B. A narration of severall passages betwixt His Majesty and Master B. Reymes, at Newmarket, concerning the army (Wing R1211).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Chancery lane neer the Rouls
